entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:34 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 06:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -33.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -36.7°C
Wind: WSW 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few clouds. High minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 41 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 41 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
